thread.title: Country singer Scotty McCreery to write autobiography
thread.title_full: Country singer Scotty McCreery to write autobiography

title: Country singer Scotty McCreery to write autobiography
text:
Al Wagner Country singer Scotty McCreery to write autobiography 
FILE - In this June 11, 2015 file photo, Scotty McCreery performs at Riverfront Stage at the CMA Music Festival in Nashville, Tenn. McCreery, the young man who won “American Idol” with his impressive baritone voice, is releasing his first book. The singer, who turns 22 on Friday, announced that his book, “Go Big or Go Home: The Journey Toward the Dream,” will be released on May 3, 2016 through Zondervan. (Photo by Al Wagner/Invision/AP, File) Evan Agostini Country singer Scotty McCreery to write autobiography 
FILE - In this Nov. 5, 2014 file photo, Scotty McCreery arrives at the 48th annual CMA Awards in Nashville, Tenn. McCreery, the young man who won “American Idol” with his impressive baritone voice, is releasing his first book. The singer, who turns 22 on Friday, announced that his book, “Go Big or Go Home: The Journey Toward the Dream,” will be released on May 3, 2016 through Zondervan. (Photo by Evan Agostini/Invision/AP, File) Posted: Thursday, October 8, 2015 11:14 am Country singer Scotty McCreery to write autobiography Associated Press | 
NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) — Country singer Scotty McCreery, who won "American Idol" with his impressive baritone voice, is writing his first book. 
The singer, who will be 22 on Friday, says his autobiography, "Go Big or Go Home: The Journey Toward the Dream," will be released May 3, 2016, through Zondervan. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety. You
